name: Sanity Check
description:
Story

You've just finished a night of DnD at your friend's place, but now it's time to get back home. For some reason, your usual route home seems eerier than usual. To quell your fears, use your D20 to perform a Sanity Check at each seemingly benign encounter. Only the best rolls will let you go home safely.

Controls

Mash WASD to cycle home.

Don't slow down, or else.
